mapper.select: select creator_oecuid, units_sold_range, selection_region, med_gmv_revenue_range, creator_bind_mcn_name, industry_groups, top_follower_gender, top_follower_ages, follower_cnt, top_follower_age, video_avg_view_cnt from tiktok_creator_user_info where user_id = #{userId}

select user_id, creator_oecuid, units_sold_range, selection_region, med_gmv_revenue_range, creator_bind_mcn_name, industry_groups, top_follower_gender, top_follower_ages, follower_cnt, top_follower_age, video_avg_view_cnt from tiktok_creator_user_info where user_id in
#{id}
